meanings.definition: Behaving in a frivolous or flighty manner
meanings.sent1: He made a ditsy decision to wear mismatched socks to the party.
meanings.sent2: The ditsy friend changed plans last minute without thinking.
meanings.sent3: The ditsy squirrel kept hopping from tree to tree without a care.
meanings.sent4: Her ditsy attitude floated like a feather in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The ditsy bird flitted from branch to branch, never staying still.

meanings.sent1: The ditsy student forgot his homework for the third time this week.
meanings.sent2: She was so ditsy that she often lost track of time.
meanings.sent3: The ditsy kitten got distracted by a shiny toy during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her ditsy mind was like a busy intersection with thoughts going in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The ditsy old man kept forgetting where he put his glasses.
